title: We need a flat LP rate.
body: I'm getting really pissed about winning and gaining 9-14 lp and then losing 25 every loss. This game needs a flat LP rate of 20. Win 20, lose 20. Oh yeah also, remove dynamic queue please.

replies.body: your mmr is really bad thats why you lose more than you gain.
That last part was definitely up-vote bait.
